articles.title: About this blog
articles.description: Welcome to my blog. I am mainly an R person so expect mostly R material! `r emo::ji("heart")`
articles.contents:
Who am I?

Like most people who will read this blog, I am a nerd, and a proud R nerd at that 😂.
I am an R-Lady and proud member of AfricaR. 🌐
I’m a mum, and hence that last picture of me visiting some far out galaxy (’cos that’s what you do when you have young kids, go on many adventures in far out places).
